import { ButtonGeneric } from "../../components/ButtonGeneric"; import "./index.css"; import { postNewExercise } from "../../services/exercises"; import { useModal } from "../../contexts/modals/index.js"; import { Modal } from "../../components/Modal"; export const NewExerciseAdmin = () => { const [modal, setModal] = useModal(null); return (
Complete el formulario para CREAR la ficha del ejercicio
{ e.preventDefault(); postNewExercise({ name: e.target.name.value, typology: e.target.typology.value, muscles: e.target.muscles.value, description: e.target.desc.value, picture: e.target.pic.files[0], }); }} >
); };
